channel.title: My holiday
channel.description:
Hey guys, just got back from a week in sharm el sheikh (egypt). I know for a fact none of you care that i was gone for such a lengthy time hehe. But anyways thought i'd post this to say that it was the best holiday ive ever been on. It wasnt an expensive hotel at all but it was still so awesome, the people who worked at the hotel smiled all day long and were so nice :p. Our room(S) were massive and there were 2 pools, one massive one with a bar built in, and one small heated one. I also spent alot of my time at the beach snorkeling around the jetty of our hotels own personal beach. Got to see loads of pretty fish and coral. But also paniced and stabbed a peice of coral into my foot which was later pulled out by a friendly egyptian man :p hehe. Also another good thing was i got served alcohol (im 15) . i drinked so much rum :)
Anyways basic summary of my lovely holiday also i got a henna tatoo and i know your all jellous.
rate/hate/bake a cake.

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Only the posh/Scottish people say bloody hell anymore.

That’s good to know. Most of my knowledge of British culture comes from the Harry Potter Books on Tape, which I listen to while forcefully removing the limbs from white supremacists in Soldier of Fortune. The perfect melody for murder is in fact the fifth novelette from JK Rowling.

Read full topic

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:10, topic:73269”]The summer 'holls, as they say in Britain. You know what they say in Britain? You know why they say that? Because they aren’t nearly drunk on beer or content on McDonalds as we are here in the US, to say “Hell”. They have to say “Bloody Hell”.

Because Jesus Fucking Christ, hell isn’t bad enough. It has to be bloody hell. As if the devil and all his burning glory isn’t evil enough, he has to be covered in mother fucking blood as well.[/quote]

Only the posh/Scottish people say bloody hell anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:8, topic:73269”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=107672.msg1081856#msg1081856 date=1175559687]
Well the taxi driver i had from the airport to my hotel was incredibly dodgy.
I wouldnt trust him at all.
But the workers at my hotel just seemed happy all day long :s really didnt understand it.
[/quote]

Yeah, hotel workers are usually happy and stuff, some are and some aren’t everywhere else.[/quote]
well ive been on 6 holidays abroad and ive never come across any hotel workers as nice as these, or maybe in ibiza… i was only 6 so i cant remember much,

Oh and pault… thanks… for your lament/story.

Read full topic

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:73269”]I’ve been to Luxor twice, we’ve visited most of the sites(Cairo and Aswan), but honestly, I must go to sharm el shiekh to believe the day I see friendly Egyptians…

In Aswan, some kid yanked a piece of my hair as I got in a cab, in Cairo, a taxi driver knocked over a kid, got out and started yelling at him, and the hassle was horrendous.[/quote]

I have been to luxor, las vegas lol

Read full topic

Because Jesus Fucking Christ, hell isn’t bad enough. It has to be bloody hell. As if the devil and all his burning glory isn’t evil enough, he has to be covered in mother fucking blood as well.[/quote]
I’ve missed you and your somewhat confusing posts paul.

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah if I lived down in the Caribbean I would want to be a bar tender. They all get hammered with you and stuff. This one dude at the bar was so black and his teeth were so white. He was standing up against a black background and like all you could see were his teeth and I was so hammered it was hilarious.

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I’ve been to Luxor twice, we’ve visited most of the sites(Cairo and Aswan), but honestly, I must go to sharm el shiekh to believe the day I see friendly Egyptians…

In Aswan, some kid yanked a piece of my hair as I got in a cab, in Cairo, a taxi driver knocked over a kid, got out and started yelling at him, and the hassle was horrendous.

item.title: My holiday
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Hey guys, just got back from a week in sharm el sheikh (egypt).
I know for a fact none of you care that i was gone for such a lengthy time hehe.
But anyways thought i’d post this to say that it was the best holiday ive ever been on.
It wasnt an expensive hotel at all but it was still so awesome, the people who worked at the hotel smiled all day long and were so nice :p.
Our room(S) were massive and there were 2 pools, one massive one with a bar built in, and one small heated one.
I also spent alot of my time at the beach snorkeling around the jetty of our hotels own personal beach.
Got to see loads of pretty fish and coral.
But also paniced and stabbed a peice of coral into my foot which was later pulled out by a friendly egyptian man hehe.
Also another good thing was i got served alcohol (im 15) .
i drinked so much rum

Anyways basic summary of my lovely holiday
also i got a henna tatoo and i know your all jellous.

rate/hate/bake a cake.
